name: 20 Seconds (cytanic)
description:
*This game was made for a jam however if i see support

i will improve it with more levels and updates :D*

*Play in Full Screen*

*You control two players, player 2 is the reflection of player 1*

*Use the mirror to absorb the musical notes

*Survive 20 seconds to win

*Move with w/a/s/d or Arrows

*THE MOST IMPORTAT "ENJOY"*
